chart.title: Annual deforestation
chart.note: The UN FAO publish forest data as the annual average on 10- or 5-year timescales. The following year allocation applies: "1990" is the annual average from 1990 to 2000; "2000" for 2000 to 2010; "2010" for 2010 to 2015; and "2015" for 2015 to 2020.
chart.citation: UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO). Forest Resources Assessment.

Deforestation.citationShort: – processed by Our World in Data
Deforestation.citationLong: – processed by Our World in Data. “Annual deforestation rate” [dataset]. UN Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO). Forest Resources Assessment. [original data].
